name: muteAllRemoteAudioStreams
description:
Stops or resumes subscribing to the audio streams of all remote users.As of v3.3.0, after successfully calling this method, the local user stops or resumes subscribing to the audio streams of all remote users, including all subsequent users.
   
       
  Call this method after joining a channel.
  See recommended settings in Set the Subscribing
                            State.

parameters.mute:
Whether to subscribe to the audio streams of all remote users:
                                true: Do not subscribe to the
                                    audio streams of all remote users.
                                false: (Default) Subscribe to
                                    the audio streams of all remote users by default.
